mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account AS "account", a.password AS "password", a.email AS "email", a.telphone AS "telphone", a.idcard AS "idcard", a.state AS "state", a.img AS "img", a.last_logintime AS "lastLogintime", a.last_loginaddress AS "lastLoginaddress", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_front_user( account, password, email, telphone, idcard, state, img, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{account}, #{password}, #{email}, #{telphone}, #{idcard}, #{state}, #{img}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
